37 #include <moveit/ompl_interface/detail/threadsafe_state_storage.h>
38 
39 ompl_interface::TSStateStorage::TSStateStorage(const moveit::core::RobotModelPtr& robot_model)
40  : start_state_(robot_model)
41 {
42  start_state_.setToDefaultValues();
43 }
44 
45 ompl_interface::TSStateStorage::TSStateStorage(const moveit::core::RobotState& start_state) : start_state_(start_state)
46 {
47 }
48 
49 ompl_interface::TSStateStorage::~TSStateStorage()
50 {
51  for (auto& thread_state : thread_states_)
52  delete thread_state.second;
53 }
54 
55 moveit::core::RobotState* ompl_interface::TSStateStorage::getStateStorage() const
56 {
57  moveit::core::RobotState* st = nullptr;
58  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> slock(lock_);
59  std::map<std::thread::id, moveit::core::RobotState*>::const_iterator it =
60  thread_states_.find(std::this_thread::get_id());
61  if (it == thread_states_.end())
62  {
63  st = new moveit::core::RobotState(start_state_);
64  thread_states_[std::this_thread::get_id()] = st;
65  }
66  else
67  st = it->second;
68  return st;
69 }
